en: Save me, O God; For the waters are come in unto my soul.
hmr: Aw Pathien, mi sandam rawh, Tuihai chu ka rînga chen hin a lût ta sih a.

en: I sink in deep mire, where there is no standing: I am come into deep waters, where the floods overflow me.
hmr: Chirhak inthûktak, sirsan hrim hrim um nawnaah ka tlum duok duok hi, Tui inthûktak, tui lien a mi chîm tlumnaahai, ka lo lût ta hi.

en: I am weary with my crying; my throat is dried: Mine eyes fail while I wait for my God.
hmr: Ka khêkna leiin ka chau a, ka dang a ṭâwl zo tah a: Ka Pathien ka nghâknaa hin ka mit ân vai zo tah a.

en: They that hate me without a cause are more than the hairs of my head: They that would cut me off, being mine enemies wrongfully, are mighty: That which I took not away I have to restore.
hmr: A san boa a mi theidatuhai chu ka samzai nêkin an tam lem a, Indiknawtaka mi doa, mi sukbohmang tumtuhai chu mi hrâttak an nih, Kân rûk dêr naw khawm an min rultir a.

en: O God, thou knowest my foolishness; And my sins are not hid from thee.
hmr: Aw Pathien, nang chun kân vêtzie hi i hriet a, Ka thiemnawnahai khawm hi i kuoma chun thup a ni nawh.

en: Let not them that wait for thee be put to shame through me, O Lord Jehovah of hosts: Let not those that seek thee be brought to dishonor through me, O God of Israel.
hmr: Aw LALPA, sipaihai Pathien, nangma nghâktuhai chu keia leiin muolpho naw hai sienla, Aw Israelhai Pathien, nangma zawngtuhai che chu keima leiin sukzakin um naw raw hai se.

en: Because for thy sake I have borne reproach; Shame hath covered my face.
hmr: Nangma leia hrilsiet ka tuor leiin. Inzaknain ka hmai ân khum zo tah.

en: I am become a stranger unto my brethren, And an alien unto my mother’s children.
hmr: Ka unauhai laia chun mikhuol ka hung ni tah a, Ka nu nauhai kuoma chun hriet ngailo mi ka lo ni tah a.

en: For the zeal of thy house hath eaten me up; And the reproaches of them that reproach thee are fallen upon me.
hmr: I ina ka ṭhahnemngainain a mi fâk zo a, Nangma hrilsetuhai hrilsietnahai chu ka chungah a tla zo tah.

en: When I wept, and chastened my soul with fasting, That was to my reproach.
hmr: Ka ṭap a, bu nghei puma ka hringna ka thunun leh, Chu chu an mi hrilsietna a hung ni pei a.

en: When I made sackcloth my clothing, I became a byword unto them.
hmr: Ka silfêna saiip ka hmang leh, An ta dingin a se tienga hrilkhina ka hung ni pei a.

en: They that sit in the gate talk of me; And I am the song of the drunkards.
hmr: Kul kawtkhâra ṭhunghai chun ka chungchâng thu an hril a, Zu inrui hmanghai hla ka ni hi.

en: But as for me, my prayer is unto thee, O Jehovah, in an acceptable time: O God, in the abundance of thy lovingkindness, Answer me in the truth of thy salvation.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, aw LALPA, kei chun chu hun lâwmumah, i kuomah a nih ka ṭawngṭâi chu; Aw Pathien, i ngilneina nasatak leiin, I sandamna thutak chun mi hung dawn rawh.

en: Deliver me out of the mire, and let me not sink: Let me be delivered from them that hate me, and out of the deep waters.
hmr: Chirhaka inthawk hin mi sanhim la, mîn tlumtir lul naw rawh. A mi theidatuhaia inthawk le, tui inthûktaka inthawk hi sanhimin mîn umtir rawh.

en: Let not the waterflood overwhelm me, Neither let the deep swallow me up; And let not the pit shut its mouth upon me.
hmr: Tui lienin mi chîm tlum naw sienla, Tui inthûktak hin mi lem bawk naw raw se; Khursûng khawmin a bau mîn chîpnel naw raw se.

en: Answer me, O Jehovah; for thy lovingkindness is good: According to the multitude of thy tender mercies turn thou unto me.
hmr: Aw LALPA, mi hung dawn la, i ngilneina chu a ṭha si a, I lainatna nasat ang peiin keia tieng hi hung ngha la.

en: And hide not thy face from thy servant; For I am in distress; answer me speedily.
hmr: I siehlaw kuoma hin i hmai khawm thup naw la, Ka lunginzîng sih a, mi hung dawn vak rawh.

en: Draw nigh unto my soul, and redeem it: Ransom me because of mine enemies.
hmr: Ka hringna hi hung hnaiin intlan la, A mi dotuhai lei hin nangin mi sanhim rawh.

en: Thou knowest my reproach, and my shame, and my dishonor: Mine adversaries are all before thee.
hmr: Nangin mi mi hrilsietna dâm, ka muolphona dâm, kân zakna dâm, hi i hriet a. A mi dotuhai chu i hmaah an um vawng a nih.

en: Reproach hath broken my heart; and I am full of heaviness: And I looked for some to take pity, but there was none; And for comforters, but I found none.
hmr: Mi mi hrilsietna hin lungriem- in a mi thlâk a, nasatakin ka lungngai bawk a, Chuongchun, a mi lunginsiettu ding ka zawng a; nisienlakhawm, tukhawm an um si nawh; A mi thlamuontu dinghai ka zawng a; nisienlakhawm, tukhawm ka hmu si nawh.

en: They gave me also gall for my food; And in my thirst they gave me vinegar to drink.
hmr: Ka bu dingin thil kha an mi pêk nâwk nghâl a, Ka dang a châr hlakin uoin thûr dâwn dingin an mi pêk a,

en: Let their table before them become a snare; And when they are in peace, let it become a trap.
hmr: An hmaa an dawkân chu châng lo ni sienla, Lungmuongtaka an um laiin bil lo ni raw se.

en: Let their eyes be darkened, so that they cannot see; And make their loins continually to shake.
hmr: An mithai chu an hmu theinawna dingin sukthimin hung um sienla, An kâwnghai chu sukthin rawp rawh.

en: Pour out thine indignation upon them, And let the fierceness of thine anger overtake them.
hmr: I lungninawna nasatak chu an chungah bunthla la, I lunginsen ṭiumna chun anni chu man raw se.

en: Let their habitation be desolate; Let none dwell in their tents.
hmr: An umna chu hung ṭâwp sienla, An puon inahai chun tukhawm um naw raw se.

en: For they persecute him whom thou hast smitten; And they tell of the sorrow of those whom thou hast wounded.
hmr: I ivuok chu an suknawmnah a, I înhliemhai lungngaizie chu an hril si hlak a.

en: Add iniquity unto their iniquity; And let them not come into thy righteousness.
hmr: An rîtlona chu rîtlonain belsa la, Anni chu i felnaa chun lût naw raw se.

en: Let them be blotted out of the book of life, And not be written with the righteous.
hmr: Anni chu hringna bua inthawk chun thaihmangin um hai sienla, Mi felhai laia chun ziek ni ve naw raw hai se.

en: But I am poor and sorrowful: Let thy salvation, O God, set me up on high.
hmr: Nisienlakhawm, kei chu rimsitak le lungngaitak ka na, Aw Pathien, i sandamna chun hmun insângah mi sie raw se.

en: I will praise the name of God with a song, And will magnify him with thanksgiving.
hmr: Pathien hming chu hlain inpâk ka ta, Lâwmthu hrilin ama chu chawimawi ka tih.

en: And it will please Jehovah better than an ox, Or a bullock that hath horns and hoofs.
hmr: Chuong ang chun, bâwngchal amanih, ki le tin nei bâwngchal nêk chun, LALPA suklâwm lem a tih.

en: The meek have seen it, and are glad: Ye that seek after God, let your heart live.
hmr: Mi rimsihai chun chu chu an hmuh a, an lâwm a, Nangni Pathien zawngtuhai, in lungril chu hringin um raw se.

en: For Jehovah heareth the needy, And despiseth not his prisoners.
hmr: LALPAIN pasiehai chu a bengkhawn a, A mi intânghai chu a hmusit si nawh a.

en: Let heaven and earth praise him, The seas, and everything that moveth therein.
hmr: Hnuoi le vân chun ama chu inpâk raw se; Tuisuoriet le an sûnga thil châng thei taphawthai leh.

en: For God will save Zion, and build the cities of Judah; And they shall abide there, and have it in possession.
hmr: Pathienin Zion chu sansuokin, Juda khuohai chu a siem ding a ni sih a, Chuongchun, chutaka chun um an ta, nei nghâl an tih.

en: The seed also of his servants shall inherit it; And they that love his name shall dwell therein.
hmr: A siehlawhai thlahai khawm chun hluosâwng an ta, A hming ngainatuhai chu a sûngah um an tih.
